subject: Fashion
title: Dress Code Power Dynamics
description: A fast breakdown of Dress Code Power Dynamics for builders.

hook.text: In most offices, the boss wears whatever they want. Everyone else follows the dress code.

buildup.text: Dress codes are power tools. Those who set them define 'professional'‚Äîand who gets to belong.

discovery.text: Research shows dress codes disproportionately police women and people of color, especially hairstyles.

twist.text: Zuckerberg's hoodie was called genius. A junior employee in the same hoodie would be sent home.

climax.text: Dress codes pretend to be about standards. They're really about who has the power to break the rules.

punchline.text: Dress codes enforce power, not professionalism.

quiz.question: What do dress codes fundamentally reflect according to workplace psychology research?
options: Universal standards of professionalism that apply equally to everyone
Power dynamics that determine who sets the rules and who is allowed to break them
Practical safety requirements necessary for workplace efficiency
